website_summaries.verdict: You don't need the high doses of vitamins and minerals found in each serving, but there's no denying that it covers all the bases.
pros: Covers all the basic vitamins and minerals
Contains enzymes and amino acids for better nutrient absorption and improved body functions
cons: Your body can't absorb all of the vitamins and minerals found in a single serving

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Optimum Nutrition Opti-Men for a year(since April of 2017). I have been taking the recommended dose of 3 pills every day for that time-frame. Recently, I decided to do an Intolerant/Nutrient test where I send my hair to the lab and they analyze it. I was shocked at the results! I was low on Vitamin B12, C, D, Iodine, and Boron. Low being a nutritional deficiency level of under 15%. Needless to say, I've canceled my subscribe and save. I just wish I didn't waste over $240 over the last year on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: What happened to you ON?! Bait and switch? Really?!
customer_reviews.text: Compare the old ingredient amounts to the reformulated product: YOU’RE GETTING HALF THE MULTIVITAMIN FOR THE SAME COST. Long-time ON product user, very surprised at the horrible reformulation of the opti-men multivitamin - which I’ve taken for years. Less of the ingredients we buy this for - this multi literally pales in comparison to its previous iteration, yet costs the same. As an added benefit - it crumbles and falls apart when exposed to air/moisture/strong-language. The reformulation is an absolute failure - there is no reason to order this product any longer. Now I’ll need to inspect every order of gold-standard whey to ensure that they haven’t “reformulated” it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike.the.kraken

customer_reviews.title: New coating breaks down
customer_reviews.text: These used to be great but the new coating they're using breaks down with any humidity. It's fine in the bottle with the desiccate packet but a day after I put them in my pill container (which I need to use in order to remember to take them) the coating comes apart and the pills get all jagged and tough to swallow. I'll be looking for a new brand because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A Decker

customer_reviews.title: Warning to people who use pill organizers
customer_reviews.text: If you take them out of the bottle for more than a day or so, they will begin to crumble and flake apart.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Flake apart - not the same!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking Opti-Men for over five years, but that is about to change. Evidently the company has changed the product and now they disintegrate in my weekly pilll dispenser before the week is over. The vitamins start peeling apart, not in a week, but the second day that they have set in the holder. Did not have this problem in the past and by the time you get to the 5th, 6th, & 7th day, the vitamin has almost completely flaked apart and very hard to swallow - will be searching for new brand - any suggestions accepted. Thanks and stay away from Opti-Men.
customer_reviews.author: C Glenn Lester Jr

customer_reviews.title: Lowered my energy bill
customer_reviews.text: These made my pee turn stark yellow. Like to the point where it gave off light. In fact, I bottled up my piss and hung the bottles from the ceiling and no longer even use my house lights. I just hang up my bottles of piss when I need light. Saved me a few hundred a year so I cant complain. In all seriousness though, these make me feel great. I personally take 2 a day instead of the 3 (3 seems a bit much) and it definitely gives me a boost for both working out and just day to day functions. Do be warned though, you might have radiant piss if you take these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and still amazing. Only missing caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Best Vitamins out there :D over all since starting taking these I've had a over all well being of health. If that makes sense. Better than my last vitamins. These vitamins right here really help and is very very noticeable. And potent is very potent. Lol love them. Only thing there missing is caffeine as an ingredient 250mg .
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I bought this 4 months ago and forgot to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 months ago and forgot to use until Oct. Then I remember that I need to use it but when I open, the tablet has some black spot on it, it really makes me worry whether that's the original color of it. Need help on this. Images attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: I rarely submit negative feedback, but this product is just unacceptable. I purchased one bottle only, and have been buying vitamins for over 40 years. This is the only vitamin product to ever separate and decompose. Stored in the same cabinet with a dozen other supplements, never any issues, these vitamins expanded and separated in a couple of layers starting at about 2 months after purchase. Never again...
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Bottled vomit
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying this vitos for years for weightlifting and general health. Theyve changed coatings once or twice over the years. Im perfectly fine with change, however whatever has been done recently is terrible!! Did i accidently order Harry Potters : Bertie Bott Beans (Flavor Vomit) Amazon Exclusive? Wth is going on, I cant even bring myself to take these things. Please change it back. Ive tried every type of drink that is mildly healthy including blending these things up in a cauldron of fruit and i can still taste it. Its overwhelming and worst of all it doesn't just taste bad it lingers in your mouth. Its what id imagine being part of a human centipede would be like.
customer_reviews.author: Griffen

customer_reviews.title: best multi vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of optimum nutrition for a while and these have been my go to forever! pros and cons are as follows: Pros: affordable great ingredients Approved by my family doctor (yes i had him look them over) everything you need in a daily supplement cons: serving size is 3 pills... i take one a day they are fairly large if you have a problem taking medication taste is bad, but they really should just be swallowed immediately don't let them sit in your mouth makes your pee dark, but that's just excess vitamins your body isn't using overall i would highly recommend these to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sargent Dude

customer_reviews.title: No effects overall
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel anything after a few weeks of regularly taking this supplement, to be honest. Although it seems like it contains a lot of essential vitamins for men on the nutrition label, I'm not really sure if I could trust the label since it's not approved by the FDA anyways.
customer_reviews.author: AKN

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good, but now they are bad.
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking these for some years and really liked them, however the formula has apparently changed multiple times and I'm done with them. For a while they would start falling apart due to humidity. That looked unpleasant, but didn't bother me too much. But after they "fixed" that problem, the new batch of pills smelled so horrible that they made me gag. They literally smelled rancid. I couldn't take it anymore and abandoned the product. Maybe they will return to the original good formula some day, but i'm not taking any chances. Very happy with my new men's multivitamin from Centrum now.
customer_reviews.author: M. D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Strong odor - smells like animal urine
customer_reviews.text: written 10/21/19 - i've had no problem in the past with this product, but this shipment (OPTI-MEN, 150 caps, purchased 10/10/19, expiration date 04/21) has a ridiculously strong odor that i would place as dog/cat urine. i'm not sure if this is what they smell like now, but i've never had them smell this bad before. side of the bottle says "Contains: shellfish (oysters)", maybe that is the reason for the massive smell, but idk. it makes them difficult to take.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: A great but misleading multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multivitamin, but it looses a few stars. One star is lost because these pills smell absolutely horrible. It’s borderline wretched which also makes it hard to swallow. The value is another star lost. Your body CANT absorb the bottles recommended dose. ONE pill a day is much better for body absorption and you get a much better value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A.

customer_reviews.title: Drink water
customer_reviews.text: I literally take 1 a day. If you notice how yellow and vitamin smelling your urine is it's because your body can't absorb it all at once. Drink plenty of water and take it with breakfast. Vitacock...yes that's right. You get it everytime you take these pills. You owe out half the pill anyways. Do not leave out overnight or on the counter. The film coating is very minimal at best. The pill will start to dissolve and crack etc. It doesn't bother me if I just take it when I grab it from the dam bottle like you should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best multi-vitamin around imo
customer_reviews.text: I love this multi-vitamin. I've used this product for the last nine years. The only thing I did was change up how the suggested use was done. It suggest you take 3 tablets with a meal. The issue with this is you end up urinating out most if not all the vitamins with offer no support to the consumer. What I did was take 1 tablet with breakfast, lunch and dinner. This way you have a continuous supply of vitamin saturation in the body and maximize the benefits of this multi-vitamin. I always recommend this product to everyone I talk to and even the female form. Thank you optimum nutrition for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Damages body
customer_reviews.text: I took this product 2 yrs ago as a substitute to multivitamins along with a little boost to my workouts. I started taking it again a week ago and noticed that the product does not yield the same results anymore. It caused frequent urination (20 times in a day) and I was afraid that it might cause further damage to kidneys etc. so I stopped taking it. I wish I could return the remaining pills if the manufacturer may reverse engineer to find out whether there might be something wrong with the recipe of the batch I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: SReviews

customer_reviews.title: They need to fix this disintegrating issue or its time to move on
customer_reviews.text: I put my vitamins in one of those weekly pill boxes and apparently they have some new coating that makes the vitamins easier to swallow. The problem is that they start to disintegrate if you put them in any container other than the bottle they came in. When this happens they become jagged and rough and are definitely not easier to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: After using this product then taking a break from it ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this product then taking a break from it (lack of funds), then coming back to it I have noticed a considerable difference in energy levels and overall physical well being.
customer_reviews.author: christopher james anthony mobley

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and trustworthy manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: If you decide a vitamin supplement is necessary for you, these are a great choice. I purchased because I am doing strength training 3 days a week and wanted to be sure I was getting all the vitamins necessary...diet not always where I want it nutrition wise, so I purchased these to cover any holes. Did a lot of research prior to buying. This brand is always highly rated for quality and trust in manufacturing...you really get what they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Formula breaks down when use in pill carrier/dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: Having same issue as everyone else. I take prescriptions 2x day and I use a pill organizer I fill once a week. The past two subscribe and save monthly orders are the “new” formulat and they start breaking down within a day. Cancelling subscribe and save and looking for something else. As common as pill carriers/dispensers are, you would think this would have been tested with the “new” formula before putting it out to the public. Disappointed as I’ve been taking these daily for the past 5 years. Hopefully I’ll have better luck with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased this product many times via Amazon. However ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product many times via Amazon. However, the pills in this most recent bottle were all flaky, cracked and would instantly turn to dust if put in your pocket. The seal didn't appear to be tampered with upon receipt so I'm not sure how this happened. It's undoubtedly an ineffective product. I've decided to move on and try Orange Triad for a change of pace men's MV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly
customer_reviews.text: Cannot be placed in pill organizer. The oils dry out and crumble if taken out of the pill bottle for longer than a few hours. Never saw this happen to any supplement ever.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Opti-men or Opti-diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for several years. Up in till the last batch I was fine then when I got this one I started getting bad diarrhea I've litteraly had it for a whole month in a half I started thinking I had some underlying health problem. Then I tried stopping opti-men and my bowl movements were back to normal. I'm not sure if the ingredients were changed or I got a bad batch but no matter I won't be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using ON products for years. These vitamins used to taste fine, go down fine and not cause stomach issues. Now they smell horrible, break down if exposed to air and cause gastro issues. I felt sluggish compared to the last bottle purchased so I switched to another brand and now feel great. Our bodies require high end products, not sub-par ingredients. Like everything else, they are sacrificing safety and quality to make a buck..just lost me as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: TravelTech007

customer_reviews.title: Be healthy
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are MY observations. I have been an Animal Pak user for years vs an Opt Men user for the past couple of months. The Animal Pak label says take 2 packs a day. So I did that. Opti Men says take 3 tabs a day. So I did that. 2 packs of 11 vs 3. Also, I feel SLIGHTLY healthier over these past couple of months. Not that Animal Pak did not make me feel healthy. So, again, ME, 3 is better than 11X2 and I feel slightly healthier. There’s a bunch of other good multivitamins too. But I’ll be sticking with Opti Men for a while.
customer_reviews.author: He Man

customer_reviews.title: Too much vitamin B6
customer_reviews.text: Too much vitamin B6, although can make you feel energetic, but the concern is higher lung cancer risk. There are many studies confirmed that too much vitamin B6/B12 is a risk for men (not for women). Increased vitamin B6 catabolism is related to inflammation and immune activation is associated with a higher risk of developing lung cancer. The greatest risk was found among men with the highest average daily dose of B6 (>20 mg/day was associated with an 82% greater risk) and B12 (>55 mcg/day was associated with a 98% greater risk).
customer_reviews.author: Guest of a guest

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good.  Product quality has gone down.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pills for the last few years. Really enjoyed them at first, and started to regularly take them so I signed up for the Subscribe & Save since I was going to continue taking them. But noticed the last few bottles have several pills that are breaking apart. I'm not sure if they are just getting old (this is before the expiration date on the bottle) or the product quality is starting to drop. Either way I will start looking for another brand of vitamins if the next bottle also has cracked pills.
customer_reviews.author: Calpatch

customer_reviews.title: Side effects at recommended dosage pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a regular weightlifting routine. Taking at the recommended dosage (3/day) even with good water and food intake led to some pretty unfortunate side effects that started about 2 days in. Headaches, weird dry eyes, and frequent urination. Tried dialing down the dosage to just 1/day, symptoms got better but still there. Odor of tablets is unpleasant, but not totally unbearable. Maybe could be usable at a <1 tablet/day regimen, but at that point.. just get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: HoopyDoopy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ingest/ but splits if left out more than a day
customer_reviews.text: I like to get my supplements ready for the next 3- 5 days in a pill box, as i meal prep for the week. This supplement however, can't be left out of the container it comes in for more than a day because the pills split into pieces. I keep moisture packages in the pill box and change it periodically but that doesn't seem to help. Pills are easy to swallow and doesn't leave any after taste. Ingredients could be a little better, but I guess because it's mainstream it has some fillers. Over all, good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nesto

customer_reviews.title: Read the Reviews! I didnt and regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I just wasted 21 dollars on the 150 pills, but this product is horrible I wish I read the reviews first before buying. Dude my piss is a very scary bright fluorescent yellow and Ive never seen this in my life. Also I felt sick after my workout which I have never experienced with the same routine as always. Switching back to my regular brand and not coming back. I advise you do the same, Fluorescent piss and feeling crappy no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Albino

customer_reviews.title: SHELLFISH ALERT!
customer_reviews.text: The raw oyster extract in these pills just make them smell god awful. Its part of ON's "Viri Mens Blene" thats included in this MV. I do notice that I do have a bit more energy, not so groggy in the morning. But if you have a shellfish allergy, then you should not take this MV. ON putting shellfish in this MV definitely alienates a certain populous of consumers. And honestly, I think the raw oyster extract does nothing except stink up the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel V.

customer_reviews.title: Ooooh that smell
customer_reviews.text: have used these for years and been very happy with them till the last two orders. I opened the 1st bottle and some of the tablets looked older and had cracked and the outside layer looked to be peeling away. Also the smell was rancid. so I returned them for a replacement and while the replacement did not have an issue with tablet appearance there was still that smell so I have returned them for a refund and do not think I will be purchasing these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: E. Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Smells very very Bad.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely TERRIBLE SMELL. Ive used optimen for years, this is the firat and LAST time buying it from amazon. The smell is horrid, and unlike any other optimen bottles ive had. Im going to trash these and buy elsewherw.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: These used to be good!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these vitamins (hence the 2-stars instead of just 1). However, after their “new formula” which was supposed to make the pills more easily digestible, the vitamins have begun crumbling into dust before I can even take them. It appears that exposure to the air oxidizes the vitamins, peeling and crumbling them into dust. It’s extremely inconvenient for anyone who likes to leave their vitamins out or carry them in a separate container for taking them on the go. I would not recommend purchasing these until the oxidation issue has been addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Oleski

customer_reviews.title: improved Energy and Mood
customer_reviews.text: they do work they gave me energy and enhanced my mood. they are really great and I cant stress that enough. I did not find the pills to be large nor causing me any known negative side effect. for reference I am 27y M diabetic
customer_reviews.author: Saad

customer_reviews.title: To strong of vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to take this product. But after a couple hours of my first pill I took i noticed my urine was neon yellow. I was sceptical. I read that it was because way to many ingredients and how much of each vitamin is in the pills. I decided to try a second time just to be sure. And same results. Maybe something good for someone who has a big vitamin deficiency. I am sad that I purchased the 250 quantity and only took 2. Now the rest is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of what I want in a multi - but some drawbacks...
customer_reviews.text: When you open the bottle the tablets give off a bad smell, so that's unpleasant. They are coated and flavorless if you get them down quickly though. Serving size is 3 tablets daily - a little inconvenient. I wish it were 2 tablets daily, for morning and evening. Why is the bottle huge and then only half full? Wasteful packaging makes for wasteful shipping and more difficult storage for the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: don_chuwish

customer_reviews.title: Oyster smell kills it
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know how to compare this one vs other vitamin resources. I do not feel any difference taking these pills vs other brands. So I was just wondering if people who take them actually notice any kind of noticeable change in their body/mood and etc, or ...? The only thing that I can mention though is what I noticed that I do NOT like, the dominant Oyster smell. They should have made capsules instead.
customer_reviews.author: N Man

customer_reviews.title: Help me maintain energy levels during caloric deficit
customer_reviews.text: I am currently cutting and focusing on retaining muscle. During these times calorie and food intake is restricted, usually resulting in vitamin deficiencies. These vitamins have so far helped me maintain energy levels while reducing caloric intake. I am taking one in the morning and one at night even though the bottle suggests to take three. Yes they make your pee a funny color, but that is more incentive to drink more water! (keep your urine crystal clear) I plan on taking these indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Logan McNulty

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be experimenting with the pills
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for more than 8 years and have been happily promoting it to everyone that asks about multi vitamin. However, they seem to be experimenting with the formula. Last time the pills didn't last very long before starting to look old and crumble. This time I thought the pills were damaged from factory as they have the worst rotten egg smell, but they actually seem to be fine, they just smell really bad, even if you don't breathe when taking them the smell breaks through. I don't think I will buy this again if this is the new "formula"
customer_reviews.author: Luis P

customer_reviews.title: Quality control is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I like these vitamins and have bought them for years. However, I'm noticing more and more that many of the vitamins are cracked, split, or totally broke in half upon opening the bottle. I will only use the ones that are not damaged, so this last bottle I ended up discarding a quarter of the bottle because of this. At the price they are, I should not have to do that. I'm going to be seeking out a different supplier.
customer_reviews.author: mjs

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins awful smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I got a bad batch or what but they smell awful! The pill itself is easy to swallow but does have an unpleasant aftertaste but it doesn’t last long if you eat something or drink something immediately after.
customer_reviews.author: Delirious

customer_reviews.title: I got acene after taking product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for quite some time now and honestly I haven't seen good coming out of it. I have more acene on face and I just feel like this product the sole reason for it. I don't like it's smell as well. Most importantly you piss all the ingredients through urine. Is it me or everyone taking this product feel like getting greenish urine after taking this
customer_reviews.author: wasil

customer_reviews.title: Somethings really off with this order
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of these and was eager to get a second batch. This time around, the pills just fall apart, getting all dusty after just being in my bag for a day or two. I tried to ignore it for a while, still took them, but honestly don't feel any of the same benefits as I did when I took them in the past. Everything about this batch is off, something funny is going on – I really need a refund on this. DONT BUY THIS UNTIL THEY FIGURE OUT HOW TO STOP FAKES
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Yu

customer_reviews.title: Irregular heartbeat!!
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 days of taking this vitamin, I developed an irregular heartbeat, and fluttering of my heart. I discontinued it and three days later the irregular heartbeat went away. I workout regularly, cardio and strength training 4 days a week, and eat right. I believe this may have something to do with the green tea ingredient in the pill.
customer_reviews.author: RICK D'AMICO

customer_reviews.title: #1 multivitamin in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: Before i purchased this product, i was using Gnc mega men multivitamin. It didn't really do much for me. After searching online for a new one, i saw a lot of great reviews for this one. I decided to give this one a try and was not disappointed. It gave me energy for work, the gym and my kids. Just remember to drink lots of water when taking any multivitamin. Great product, will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Once Great - Now Junk
customer_reviews.text: Once a great product, ON has serious issues with the coating on the pill rupturing due to humidity. Every single pill consistently ruptured from 2 separate orders on my pill planner. Sadly, they started rupturing in the actual bottle after 20 days as well. Biggest disappointment? ON would not stand by their product and replace them. Don’t buy until they resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: grasiorai

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Update!! review was 5 star the first few days until i realized i wasn't using the bathroom anymore. i was in so much paid i couldn't stand it. i stopped taking them and its been a week and I'm still having problems. would never take again or recommend. Waste of $25...
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Nutritional Facts
customer_reviews.text: The nutritional facts provided in the listing are misleading. I ordered the 150 count version and it has 3000 mcg (instead of IU) / 333% of Vitamin A (also it shows it as mixed carotenoids instead of natural mixed carotenoids in the listing). Vitamin D amount is only 37.5 mcg (again not in IU) / 188%. There are variations in other things also like Folic Acid (1000mcg vs 600mcg). Its not an expired product as the expiry is July 2019 but very misleading (specially for Vitamin D). I am attaching photos of the nutritional information in the version I received.
customer_reviews.author: Abhay Mittal

customer_reviews.title: The pill size is much smaller now. 3 instead of 2 per serving.
customer_reviews.text: I remember choking on the larger version at least 3 times in my life. This newer smaller pill will do you favors by not killing you. The formula is fantastic and I noticeably feel better when paired with a good fish oil.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Opti-men is a source of vitams
customer_reviews.text: I got mine a few weeks now and it's just awesome. I feel endless energy like I can run a marathon. I love it. The tablets are a bit big but besides that it's easy to swallow with water and the flavor is great. I would recommend this to anyone who's looking for that extra source of energy throughout their day. Looking forward to making my next purchase 💉💦💯💯
customer_reviews.author: adrian messam

customer_reviews.title: Maybe they were always bad, but competition was worse until now
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to the Optimum Nutrition brand, but they have gone downhill since the last time I bought these in 2011. Maybe they were always bad, but competition was worse until now. These pills break down so fast when not in the container. They become jagged and break apart within 24 hours if you try to put them in a pill organizer. The ingredient quality is also pretty bad. Do yourself a favor and get Rainbow One multivitamins. Better value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this supplement for about two decades. Since I started using it my health dramatically improved. There are times in which I have missed to take it for several weeks or months and I can tell the impact of not taking it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dioshy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: My top Choice
customer_reviews.text: For years this has been my go-to multi as a physique competitor. Enjoy the listing of all ingredients, unlike some other supplements that normally say proprietary blend, etc. Very strong multi, and quite potent given not needing to take 6+ tablets for a single serving.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just not the same
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these vitamins for years, but I’m returning my recent bottle. For the first time ever, I’m sending back an ON product! The new formulation is awful. At the hint of humidity the swell and burst! I could understand if it were say...3 or 4 days outside of the bottle, but we are talking overnight practically. I had kept the old formula in a organizer for a week at a time and had no problem. Now, I can’t do that anymore. Time to find a new brand, I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Hard to digest
customer_reviews.text: Pills are large and hard to digest. I experience mild stomach cramping due to this. Although you seem to be getting a high dosage of vitamin content, I didn’t realize you had to take so many in a day. If your doing a comparison with other vitamins, you should take that in to account especially when compared to a “1 a Day”. Maybe having to take so many in one day contributed to my stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M Pavliscak

customer_reviews.title: Weird Smell
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to get through the bottle but its been difficult as this stuff smells weird and the pills are large for me. They were cheap though so a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Very Hydrophilic
customer_reviews.text: I generally transfer my vitamins and prescriptions to a travel container so that I don't have to take several bottles with me on the road when I travel. These vitamins broke down pretty quick as they were exposed to humidity. They essentially turned to dust in my container. I need something a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Vivid Dreamzzz...
customer_reviews.text: If I'm ever in need of a good vivid dream, I'll pop one a few hours before bed. I once robbed a bank, ran from the police guns blazing, rat out my accomplice, and pissed myself (literally - i know, how embarrassing), all in a night's 'rest'. But seriously, it's hard to evaluate if the product is really working. I'm in good health and workout 5-6 times a week. I just gave it 4 stars because of the awesome dreams I have!! Dream on...
customer_reviews.author: Byron B.

customer_reviews.title: Not what it use to be.
customer_reviews.text: lo Sony know what ON did, but the pills do not last outside their bottle. For years I would set aside a week's worth in my pill organizer with no problems. Now, they dry up, turn brown, and the smell is pungent. What happened to his amazing product?
customer_reviews.author: Ricky P.

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched from gnc mega men to these as I use optimum nutrition supplements so wanted to finish it off with the vitamin.. they go down easy price is comparable to other brands.. recommend no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Was not the capsule but tablet. Look ok but smell nasty. Fine size to take. Time will tell on quality

customer_reviews.title: Quality multi vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I'll continue taking multi vitamins as long as I live. No matter what the experts say, it works for me.

customer_reviews.title: Sadly dissatisfied w Optimen
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Optimen multivitamins from Amazon on December 2019 and after 6 months the vitamins corroded and looks like it has broken apart. Please see image attached. I tried taking one of the vitamins that wasn't too broken and I almost choked on it because it was hard to swallow since the smooth coat that makes it easier to swallow was broken apart.
customer_reviews.author: Enrico Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking the Optimum Nutrition Opti-Men Supplement for 3 years. I'm an average guy. I don't lift weights, but I do jog at least one mile a day. My wife wants me to be healthier, so I take one pill a day with breakfast. No adverse reactions and I haven't been to the doctor for any major health problem.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: They disintegrate when exposed to air! Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews here on product quality. I noticed that pills start to disintegrate when exposed to air for longer than 30 mins. Poor quality and is in line with all the other reviews provided about this product on Amazon. Terrible quality! Photo included.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: They flake and crumble if put in a pill container
customer_reviews.text: Like others have said if you put them in a pill container they start to flake and crumble. This is the 4th bottle of these that I have purchased and this is the 1st bottle that has done this.. Not sure what has changed with the coating but its not good. These have been in the pill container for 3 days...See photo.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bohannon

customer_reviews.title: Best men’s multi on the market. Just keep the lid on!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite multi. I am a 50-year-old male and have taken this for a few years now. It is extremely comprehensive and has no aftertaste at all. You do Need to be careful that you keep the jar tightly sealed and keep the desiccant pack inside because right around days 25 and 26 the pills themselves will start to deteriorate.
customer_reviews.author: TomHunter1968

customer_reviews.title: which is nice. I don't notice much of an energy boost ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I think the old formula was stronger, this still seems to do the trick. This doesn't upset my stomach as much as the old formula either, which is nice. I don't notice much of an energy boost but I do notice feeling more tired/hungry on days when I don't take it. For reference, I usually take 1 at lunch and 1 at dinner (total recommended dose is 3 per the bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The only multi-vitamin for me
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Opti-Men vitamins for years. Whenever I go without taking them I notice a drastic difference in the way I feel, my immune system doesn't feel as strong, and I just generally don't feel as healthy. I recommend Opti-Men vitamins to all of my friends whenever we get on the topic. They're the go-to!
customer_reviews.author: Gunner K

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the human body can actually absorb all of this stuff, but I guarantee you there's a lot in it. I saw this product for 30 bucks at HEB with only one months serving, so it's definitely a good deal online. Your pee is pretty interesting to see leave your body lol! It's totally neon yellow after taking it! I recommend taking it with food. The pills are large, but the bottle clearly states there for men and not little bi***es. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: MaroonHawk

customer_reviews.title: or after using the supplement and you should be fine. Substituted this product for the gummy vitamins I ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for the taste, although I know you’re not supposed to chew the product, it did give me a slightly upset stomach when I was unable to follow with a meal. So don’t take without eating before, during, or after using the supplement and you should be fine. Substituted this product for the gummy vitamins I used to take from Walmart and it is doing well for me so far. Contains a lot of essential daily needs, I would reccomend to any of my male friends looking for a change of pace in vitamins, as an improvement in flavor for this product could make it one of the best out there. 9/10 product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Optimum Nutrition is the only way to go!!

I recommended for working out or anybody just trying to maintain General Health. Thank you optimal nutrition for making this

Bad rancid smell label different than my previous bottles pill just a little different than used to afraid to take to late to return ordered before my other bottle ran out

customer_reviews.title: All men over 60 should take this it works!
customer_reviews.text: My husband calls it the stinky pill. He takes it after he eats. I can tell the difference in him since he's been taking opt-men. He's less grouchy, more active and has a better appetite.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Might find a different vendor next time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product before & they work well, but something about this bottle was off. All of the caplets started flaking off into little pieces & it was hard to swallow them, especially towards the end of the bottle, as there were tons of flakes. Probably buy from a different vendor on amazon next time or actually go into a store where the product is fresh & not sitting in a warehouse somewhere. It’s almost like the bottle was not stored in a temperature controlled environment before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: piratephish

customer_reviews.title: Poor coating
customer_reviews.text: These pills are ok in use but coating is very poor, looks like some cheap quality from outside. If you keep the pills out for some time these pills get discolored, i usually keep my pills ready in a small bowl before i take them. Dont like them will try some other brand next time
customer_reviews.author: ShuklaYash

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart halfway through bottle
customer_reviews.text: Have taken these for years, but I have to agree that there's something different about the structure. They fall apart in the bottle. Granted, I took the pack out but I do that to everything and never have this problem. I'm not saying I wont keep taking these, but ON needs to do something about this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed about this i don't feel the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Something has changed about this i don't feel the same that i use to with a old formula i mean if they going to change the formula to keep the price down they shouldn't please brning the old formula and i don't mind paying little more on it.

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found a great multivitamin that packs everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have found a great multivitamin that packs everything I need into 3 easy and reasonably sized pills. Will be purchasing for as long as the formula stays the same.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality and Ready to Cut Your Throat Up 👎
customer_reviews.text: Always kept in dark cool cabinet in fridge. Never left open or in the light or hot temps and they have absolutely fallen apart. They are more than 10 months from expiring and more than half of the capsules are defective and unable to be taken. They would literally cut up your throat if you swallowed them. Have to throw them out and I’m out the replacement cost to get a different brand. DO NOT order these by any means. They were also discolored as well and looking funky. No thanks I’m on to the next...

customer_reviews.text: it does make you feel better or it could be a placebo effect but whatever in times like this we should all supporting our immune system to the max

customer_reviews.text: Would recommend. Solid product. Honest company. NSF has verified many of their products and ingredients in independent tests. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Best ingredients and great price

customer_reviews.title: Maybe they got some moisture in the bottle I’m not ...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe they got some moisture in the bottle I’m not certain But they started to crumble and I couldn’t stop it
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Taste and smell changed to very bad
customer_reviews.text: A bit dissapointed in the new pill. It seems smaller and there is a new coating. I’m not sure if they took something out to make it smaller. The worst thing about this new formulation is the taste and smell. It makes me gag everytime I open the bottle. Edited: so I am lowering my score more. This new formula ruined these vitamins. If you all had vitamin B, you know you are taking it. These vitamins do not appear to have vitamin B in it, as is listed in the nutrition facts. Plus, i can’t handle the hawful smell and taste. I tried it for a week, but I am now throwing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Campos

customer_reviews.title: First batch was good. Second batch smelled funny and has a bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to give me energy and alertness. Makes my pee glow so if I miss the toilet... My girlfriend will definitely know where it landed and she will most likely complain about it. It's not about her though. It's about my needs and those needs only.
customer_reviews.author: NBA Films

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy in humid climates
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great product. After the formulation/coating change, it acts like popcorn in its own bottle, even with the desiccant pack (and even a second) in it. Don’t buy this product if you live in a humid climate like the southeastern US. I contacted the company to notify them of the issue, but the response was less than helpful. I will change brands when I run out, just like so many others here.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin King

customer_reviews.title: Aweful, The pills split and crumble
customer_reviews.text: Chemically, I think its fine? who really knows objectively. But this batch is aweful. The pills/tables are splitting and cracking...even with the moisture absorbed still in the jar. Gross.

customer_reviews.title: Tabs Were Crushed and dismantled
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this was a production flaw or shipping fall but about half of the tabs were crushed. I tried to take them anyway but they were really hard to swallow and tasted awful. I wish the company would have sent me a new product, but I was late to request a cancellation because I didn't open it right away and notice the defects.

customer_reviews.text: im giving this one star for now just started taking this and gave me massive headache im going to try maybe 2 a day and see if I still get the headaches if not then I will update this review.

Been taking the DHEA for a while, but added this, and felt the difference. These really are designed for men. I still take 1 or 2 Source of Life Ultra vits just for the veggie stuff they use. I don't eat many veggies.

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for a few years and I am satisfied. I've noticed the color changes other reviewers have seen, but this is for the quality of the pill from the last bottle I bought in December. Since I have other vitamins to take, I use a weekly pill organizer to...

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins and minerals in a pill
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fish oil taste, and the fact it changed the color of my urine to a greenish yellow, it’s a good product. I can feel the difference after a week of taking it, versus a week of not taking it.

customer_reviews.title: Feel the difference against other vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular office job 8-10 hours plus I work out 3 days per week, I take this vitamins only two times per day and after the first week you feel extremely energetic and your sleeping gets better, I also wake up with really good erections even after an exhausted day.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me..
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me crazy bad migraines. No matter how many pills I take which the bottle says 3 a day by the way I would get there migraines that would not go away. Even after stopping the pills I still got migraines a week or more after.

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin for anybody looking to stay healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Great multivitamin for athletes, bodybuilders, and people (like me) who enjoy working out on the daily! Definitely good for me because as a college student, i never get all the vitamins I need from college food (yuck haha). Only funny part, your urine turns neon green or a medium yellow because of the amount of riboflavin in it hahaha (no joke).
customer_reviews.author: Paul Murillo

product_meta.title: Optimum Nutrition Opti-Men, Vitamin C, Zinc and Vitamin D, E, B12 for Immune Support Mens Daily Multivitamin Supplement, 240 Count
product_meta.description: Size:240 Count (Pack of 1)These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Vitamin C, Vitamin D and Zinc Provide Immune Support along with Vitamin E
High potency multivitamin for active men. 75+ ingredients in 4 performance blends. 25 vitamins & essential minerals and 1 gram of free form amino acids, 1,500 iu of vitamin d

We are aware that some consumers have reported product crumbling when opti men tablets are removed from the original container and put into pill carrying cases. The product is safe to consume. The crumbling is due to excess exposure to moisture in the environment when put into the pill carrying cases. There have been isolated reports of crumbling in original bottle as well. We are implementing changes to increase the integrity of the tablet when stored in all containers. You may notice a change in a color of the tablet as a result
We recommend that the product be stored in the original container and kept in a cool, dry place. Be sure to put lid on tight and do not leave containers open for extended time

At optimum nutrition, we take quality and customer satisfaction very seriously. If you are not satisfied with opti men for any reason, please contact on consumer affairs at consumer@optimumnutrition.Com
Optimum nutrition also offers a very popular opti women multi vitamin, a high potency multi vitamin for active women

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
